definitions.body: majestic (wide, lofty) of waters of sea Ex 15:10, Ps 93:4; a ship Is 33:21; a tree Ez Eze 17:23; a vine Ez Eze 17:8 ([[גֶּפֶן אַדֶּרֶת]], so Fü; or ´[[א]] n. abstr. v. sub [[אַדֶּרֶת]] infr.); also fig. of kings Ps 136:18; nations Ez Eze 32:18; gods 1Sa 4:8; of ´[[י]] Ps 93:4 Ps 76:5; of name of ´[[י]] Ps 8:2, Ps 8:9.

subst. majestic one, of nobles, chieftains, etc., Ju Jdg 5:13, Jdg 5:25, Na 2:6, Na 3:18, Je 14:3, Je 25:34 ([[אַדִּירֵי הַצּאׁן]] fig. so): Je 25:35, Je 25:36, Je 30:21, Zec 11:2, 2Ch 23:20, Ne 3:5, Ne 10:30; of ´[[י]] Is 10:34, Is 33:21; of servants of ´[[י]] Ps 16:3 (= priests ? cf. 1Ch 24:5 & v. Che).
